post:
I bought the server myself then I decided to choose another plan in the same company.But unfortunately they do not offer money back service.So I just want to sell it here.

The original prices is $85 for such a server.The server is from serverstadium, located in Seattle,WA.

Now for the rest 20 days you just need $35.

Details:

E3-1230v2/16GB DDR3 RAM/10TB monthly traffic/500GB SATA Disk/4 available IP

You can check speed here:http://216.244.71.18/100M.bin

Now sell for US$50.The service is paid till July 3th.

It depends on you to just own the server till July 3th or further.

The server is Ubuntu 12.04 server 64-bit LTS pre-installed and can not reinstall OS free of charge. IPMI is optional.

If you are interested in this offer please contact tunghsu@outlook.com for further details.
